content.rendered:
Meet the TeamWe are A&A

Home

Menu
  • Our Company
  • Our Team
  • Company News

ROBIN PHILIP

Director - Assurance And Business Advisory

About

ROBIN PHILIP

Expert advice from the right hardcore professional! Team A&A Associate is guided by Mr. Robin Philip, an expert with up-to-date knowledge in international business consulting and accounting. Extensive experience and exceptional quality of work makes him unique among other business setup consultants in Dubai. Being a leader, he guides the complete team with great energy and commitment.

With in-depth knowledge on UAE based free zones and other jurisdictions, he efficiently accomplish several company incorporations with very less time at the same time without compromising its quality. His contribution is inevitable in the process of company incorporation all over the free zones in UAE.

Commence your business right now; consult our dynamic professional and all-rounder in the team of A&A Associate LLC !

Leadership

Ahmed Abdualla Ali Mohamed Alamiri
Chairman & Partner
View Full Profile

 
CA Rajaram Durairaj
Managing Director
View Full Profile

 
Robin Philip
Director - Assurance And Business Advisory
View Full Profile

 
Georgy John
Director - Operations
View Full Profile

 
Mohammed Firoz Khan
Director – Business Development & Strategic Alliances
View Full Profile

 
Shahid Mulla
General Manager
View Full Profile

 

We work closely with all government agencies

Starting a business in Dubai. We can help you set up in a Freezone, on Mainland or Offshore.

Have a question? Get in touch today
We can provide free qualified guidance to help get you started with your business needs.

Call us today : +971 56 408 6728

Why Us?

Hassle-Free Procedure
Customised Solutions
Multiple Payment Options
Experienced Consultants
